p: A tendency towards a lower n:6/n:3 ratio (p = 0.054) in MLD was observed when lambs were fed linseed oil in comparison to control and rapeseed oil diets ( Table 5). The addition of linseed oil to the diets significantly increased PUFA/SFA ratio (p = 0.002) in MLD as compared to control and rapeseed oil groups ( Table 5). The Î” 9-desaturase index was the lowest in MLD (p = 0.062) and MS (p = 0.013) when lambs were fed linseed oil ( Tables 5, 6).
